hero.heading: Ready to
hero.subheading: Welcome to the launchpad to your dream career.

frontmatter.name: Advertising and Copywriting
frontmatter.description: Understand how to make great campaigns and write effective copy for different social media platforms. Secure a career in Advertising, or perform better creatively. For business owners, generating digital leads through great communication will be a breeze.
frontmatter.card_description: Secure a career in Advertising. For business owners, generating digital leads through great communication will be a breeze.

frontmatter.name: Aarushi Nayyar
frontmatter.credentials: Copywriter at Coca-Cola
frontmatter.bio: Aarushi is a storyteller by passion, copywriter by profession and journalist by education. She has worked with some of the biggest brands in the industry such as Coca-Cola and Marlboro. Mostly, sheâ€™s found by a river stream curled up with a good book but has peeped out of her cave to share her knowledge in the world of advertising

frontmatter.name: Android App Development
frontmatter.description: With around 70% of India's population using smart phones, Android app development is in constant demand. Take this course to design, create and run a debuggable version of your own Android App.
frontmatter.card_description: Take this course to design, create and run a debuggable version of your own Android App.

frontmatter.name: Anisha Sharma
frontmatter.credentials: Senior React Native App Developer/Designer at SwissHimmel Switzerland
frontmatter.bio: Anisha Sharma is a professional Android Application Developer and a Cryptojacking researcher. As a Computer Science Engineer, she has previously developed Android applications for various companies like Jaobol, Meet & Greet etc; She also currently serves as the Lead Developer for a Central Government initiated project "National Creche Booking Portal" under the Ministry of Women and Child Development.

frontmatter.name: Art of Selling
frontmatter.description: A course tailor made to make you super productive from day #1. This is bound to push your adrenaline levels up and get you cracking on those super deals. Sales is the most important function as it generates revenue.
frontmatter.card_description: A course tailor made to make you super productive from day #1. This is bound to push your adrenaline levels up and get you cracking on those super deals.

frontmatter.name: Sid Baliga
frontmatter.credentials: Co Producer, TBS
frontmatter.bio: "Sid Baliga, an alumnus of MIT Manipal and IIM Kozhikode, has worked in Sales & Marketing for over a decade. He has authored 2 novels, published bylines in The Times of India, Assam Tribune, and ICFAI University Press, and was quoted in Deccan Herald for his expertise in Leadership Resume Development and International Admission SOPs. He is also a Content Marketing Consultant for EdTech Startups.

frontmatter.name: Artificial Intelligence
frontmatter.description: Learn the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence & design intelligent agents to solve real world problems including games, machine learning & constraint satisfaction problems.
frontmatter.card_description: Learn the fundamentals of Artificial Intelligence & design intelligent agents including search, games, machine learning & constraint satisfaction problems.

frontmatter.name: Tushar Dhyani
frontmatter.credentials: Data Scientist at Genietalk.ai
frontmatter.bio: Tushar Dhyani is a self-learnt Machine Learning engineer with a strong background in Competitive Coding. He is an ardent researcher and has done extensive work on Statistical Learning and Computer Vision. He has also published research papers on the same. He has taken part in various student and professional level tech competitions and has successfully managed to perform in the capacity of a winner and qualifier in all of them.

frontmatter.name: AWS - Cloud Computing
frontmatter.description: Learn the AWS Cloud today to create opportunities tomorrow. Whether you wish to use the cloud at your workplace or set up a cloud computing network via Amazon Web Services, we have it all.
frontmatter.card_description: Learn using the cloud at your workplace or set up a cloud computing network via Amazon Web Services.

frontmatter.name: Tarun Vakkalagadda
frontmatter.credentials: Machine Learning Engineer at TCS
frontmatter.bio: Tarun is a tech-enthusiast currently working as a Machine Learning Engineer at a reputed MNC. He is Certified as an Amazon Web Services Certified Solutions Architect Associate and is passionate about mentoring students in tech and building platforms to impact the world through technology.

frontmatter.name: C & C++ Language
frontmatter.description: Two of the oldest and the most popular coding languages, C and C++ are used to write many operating systems like Windows, IOS and Android. Take this course to learn these coding languages and become a professional coder.
frontmatter.card_description: Take this course to learn these coding languages and become a professional coder.

frontmatter.name: Rohan Mathur
frontmatter.credentials: Chief Information Security Consultant at The Hacktivists
frontmatter.bio: A C/C++ Coach and Ethical Hacking trainer with 2+ years of experience, Rohan started learning programming with the belief that any real-life problem can be solved using just a few lines of code.  As a young achiever, Rohan has developed several corporate projects while still pursuing his under-graduation and aims to become a professional Certified Ethical Hacker.

frontmatter.name: Business Management
frontmatter.description: Have you got an idea or are you longing to solve an impending problem? Learn about the key aspects of business and entrepreneurship, from finance to marketing, to advance or start your career in the business world.
frontmatter.card_description: Learn about the key aspects of business and entrepreneurship, from finance to marketing.

frontmatter.name: Rahul Varma
frontmatter.credentials: Co-Founder & CEO at Unschool
frontmatter.bio: Co-Founder at Unschool, Rahul Varma is a Social Entrepreneur with experience in 2 successful start-ups right from his college days. He is also a TEDx speaker and has been the National Head of Operations for AIESEC in India. He is also a member of the United Nations SDSN Youth Solutions Hub and has mentored more than 1000 students in Entrepreneurship and Marketing.

frontmatter.name: Career Planning for Freshers
frontmatter.description: Create a career plan and choose your own dream career path with this course. Reflect on and enhance your self-awareness to excel in your career and your first job.
frontmatter.card_description: Reflect on and enhance your self-awareness to excel in your career and your first job.

frontmatter.name: Louise Mosseline
frontmatter.credentials: Consultant at Caron Perlon Consulting Pte. Ltd, Singapore.
frontmatter.bio:
"Louise is an HR consultant with experience +7yrs in consulting, L&D, people engagement, onboarding experience, performance management, and project management, having worked in Corporates, start-ups as well as NGOs, with a keen interest in talent development through L&D initiatives.

Helping companies build and optimize their people strategy and HR processes, she realized that most of issues companies go through start with people don't being aware of their strengths and how to use their gifted talents. This lack of self-awareness makes many freshers look for job opportunities and careers that are doesn't give the opportunity to unlock their potential and enhance their talents."

frontmatter.name: Content Writing & Marketing
frontmatter.description: Do you see content while you observe things happening around and have a way with your words? Weave them into a career with Content Writing & Marketing course and learn how to market your business, your product, and yourself!
frontmatter.card_description: Do you see content while you observe things happening around and have a way with your words?

frontmatter.credentials: Co-Founder Horizon Creative
frontmatter.bio: Sharvan TG is an experienced Digital Marketer, Entrepreneur, and Writer. He is an inquisitive person who has experience in authoring books, creating effective content and generating traffic for various clients. As a Co-Founder of his own Digital Marketing firm, he has a good experience working with reputed organisations with several freelancing projects.

frontmatter.description: Mark the digital print of your brand by learning the new age marketing skills that open limitless possibilities!
frontmatter.card_description: Mark the digital print of your brand by learning the new age marketing skills that open limitless possibilities!

As a Digital Marketer, he has had experiences around the domains of Search Engine Optimisation, Branding, PR, and Inbound marketing. Ishan is also an AIESECer having led a student community in different colleges in Chennai and beyond.

frontmatter.name: Ethical Hacking
frontmatter.description: How do you become invaluable in a cyber-led generation? By becoming a White Hat hacker and security expert!
frontmatter.card_description: How do you become invaluable in a cyber-led generation? By becoming a White Hat hacker and security expert!

frontmatter.name: Urvesh Thakkar
frontmatter.credentials: Cyber Crime Intervention Officer - National Security Database Chief Information Security Officer (CISO) - Infocious Infotech
frontmatter.bio:
"Urvesh Thakkar is a web application and penetration tester. He has several Certifications to his name: 

- CEH - Certified Ethical Hacker
- CCNA - Cisco Certified Network Associate
- XWH - NULLCON Certified Extreme Web Hacker
- BBH - Bug Bounty Hunter V1, V2
- CCIC - Diploma, Cyber Crime Investigation

Urvesh currently works as a Security Researcher at Cyber Security Society. He is also an associate member of the National Cyber Safety and Security Standards(NCSSS). He has reported various vulnerabilities in reputed government websites, thereby contributing towards the National Cyber Space. He previously worked with the Maharashtra Cyber Cell and is a volunteer at the Null Pune Community."

frontmatter.name: Cyber Security
frontmatter.description: Deep dive into the world of ethical hacking, installation of windows & linux, cracking passwords, hiding data, cloud computing and so much more!
frontmatter.card_description: Deep dive into the world of ethical hacking, installation of windows & linux, cracking passwords, hiding data, cloud computing and so much more!

frontmatter.bio:
Vishal Dave is an Ethical Hacker with over 18+ years of experience in the domain of IT security. He's a Co-founder at Revolution, the knowledge center. He is also an active member of the Owasp Kolkata Chapter - Sillycon. 
Vishal's dream and passion are to guide and motivate students. He plays an active role in converting and helping students from Being Black Hat to White Hat (Ethical Hackers).

He is a passionate developer trying to create and work with the world of software from all angles.

After her graduation, Prajakta gained her work experience with eminent architects like Dr. B.V. Doshi, Shakti Parmar & G.A. Design (Goregaoker Architects). She founded ADYA Architects & Interior Designers in December 2014 after acquiring experience across the entire lifecycle for various architectural as well as interior design projects. She is also associated with different architecture as well as interior design schools as a visiting professor like the DY Patil College Of Architecture, CTES college of Architecture & ITM-Institute of Design & Media.

She is a certified Behavioural Psychologist, NLP Practitioner and a Mental Space Psychologist. She also has experience as a Moderator and an Emcee at Corporate events and conclaves.

frontmatter.name: Zahin Hussain
frontmatter.credentials: Impact driven Entrepreneur
frontmatter.bio: Zahin is an impact-driven entrepreneur working on solutions to facilitate pathways for study abroad opportunities in Asia. She was previously responsible for the development of an entrepreneurship sandbox in South Korea that provides access to training, networks and funding to get entrepreneurs from idea to a proof of concept. She has designed 5 global start-up boot camps with over 80 aspiring entrepreneurs from over 10 countries, engaging with 30 experts from industry. The program provided $30,000 of seed funding to 5 student-led startups, with two of them generating revenue within one year.

frontmatter.name: Pooja Pathak
frontmatter.credentials: Co-Founder - Media Mantra
frontmatter.bio:
Pooja Pathak is the Co-founder of Media Mantra,  the 9th fastest-growing PR firm in the world & the 2nd fastest in Asia. She is a highly qualified professional with over 11 years of experience & has dabbled in fields of Media relations. 

A keen interest in writing and communications led her into the world of PR.   She believes an essential part of being an entrepreneur is to listen to your inner calling while staying strong and determined to achieve the goals. Driving one of the fastest-growing PR companies in the country, Pooja Pathak is a source of inspiration for many young and aspiring women entrepreneurs.

frontmatter.name: Public Speaking Training

frontmatter.card_description: Ace public speaking while you build confidence and competence through this course. This program is designed to make you an expert at articulation wile speaking to an audience.

frontmatter.name: Elisa James
frontmatter.credentials: CEO and Founder - HAPS Voice Pro
frontmatter.bio: Elisa holds a Masterâ€™s Degree in Voice Production, and a Masters in Holistic Health and teaches Vocal Mastery and Vocal Maintenance for all professional and aspiring speakers. She is an international performer with over 30 yearsâ€™ world-wide experience. Starting as an actress and dancer at a very young age, she eventually switched to singing full time and relocated from Australia to Europe in 1995 with a recording contract. After 20 more years of touring, recording and performing all over Europe and the USA, Elisa recently moved back to Australia. She now appears regularly on TV and film as an actor and presenter, and is booked as a speaker for live events. Elisa loves sharing her passion for the voice, and is expert in the psychology behind your vocal sound - uncovering the mental, physical and emotional blocks that affect speaking.  Her passion is helping YOU become a confident and eloquent speaker.

As the head of Business Development at AIESEC India, Narayanan managed 20+ Local Chapter teams. At his most recent role at Clap Global as the Chief Marketing Officer, he strategized key acquisition campaigns and advertisements.

frontmatter.bio: Kunal is one of the Best Illusionists, Mind Reader, Motivational Coach, and Mentalists in the Country currently based in Pune. Kunal has delivered his work all across the Country performing for Celebrities, Corporate Shows, College events, and many more. He is also a TEDx speaker and has been featured in Television shows like India's Got Talent, Pune's Got Talent, etc. His shows include incredible demonstrations of the Human Mind, Superhuman, Mental abilities, Mind Reading, Power of Memory, Predictions all combined with a touch of Magic and Illusion. He is the 'Man who Knows'.

questions.question: Is there a demo lecture available?
questions.answer: Yes. Once you sign up with us, you will able to access and view few demo lessons in every course.

questions.question: How do I contact my coach?
questions.answer: You may contact your coach through multiple means. The easiest way is through the Discussion Board on your profile. Junior Coaches and Mentors on the platform contact you on a regular basis to help you with project completion and the learning process. Also, you can get in touch with the Coach through Email, WhatsApp and calls subject to availability of the Coach.

questions.question: How long is the course duration?
questions.answer: Courses at Unschool are self-paced. Take 2 weeks or 3 months â€“ at Unschool, you are allowed to learn at your own pace and every course is designed to cater to your personal needs, which means you pay once and learn life-long.

questions.question: What are the modes of payment available?
questions.answer:
Unschool caters to the Indian youth and hence the choices we provide in the payment methods are diverse. You may choose to pay directly on the website through Debit/Credit cards and Internet banking, and you will receive immediate access to the course. In addition, we also provide E-wallet options and direct UPI transfers. If you are a student who doesnâ€™t use any of these electronic modes, you may choose to pay by cash to one of our Unschool Community Representatives or even directly deposit money in the bank.

Write to us at [support@unschool.in](mailto:admin@unschool.in) for more information.

questions.question: Why should I learn on Unschool?
questions.answer: Unschool is a melting pot of counter solutions to all the problems that exist in the education system. Unschool provides you with One-to-One Mentorship, Practical assessments, Certified Projects and Guaranteed Internship opportunities â€“ all of this designed and validated by industry experts. Learning never ceases at Unschool. You have life-long access to your course and you will always receive updates on the Unschool Community that you can be a part of.

questions.question: Who are these industry experts who teach the course exactly?
questions.answer: Our coaches come with experience and are working with renowned institutions. Most of our coaches are young achievers. Some companies they represent are Inc42, Nearbuy, AIESEC, Leo Burnett etc.
